artist: Artist: David Arroyo; Publisher: Guerilla Warfare Productions
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of several figures in a bar, with text and designs, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 26 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-whiote offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Reality on the Rocks, no. 1
